insights.populationGrowth: Slight decline -0.2% due to youth outmigration, but cultural tourism provides some retention.
insights.educationLevel: Good education 80% literacy. Traditional knowledge preservation programs active.

insights.temperature: Mountain-steppe climate, winters (-28°C), summers (26°C). Elevation creates diverse microclimates.
insights.precipitation: Good precipitation 280mm with mountain effects. Supports agriculture and tourism.
insights.seasonality: Cold winter, pleasant spring/summer tourist season, colorful autumn.
insights.extremeEvents: Moderate dzud, mountain weather extremes, flash floods in valleys.

preparedness.reliefCapacity: Medium - Mountain terrain challenges but tourism infrastructure helps

economicProfile.businessEnvironment: Mountain tourism development, traditional crafts, agricultural production center
